com.nmoumoulidis.opensensor.view
Class SensorStationActivity

java.lang.Object
  android.content.Context
      android.content.ContextWrapper
          android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
              android.app.Activity
                  android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
                      com.nmoumoulidis.opensensor.view.SensorStationActivity
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback
public class SensorStationActivity
extends android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity

UI class for the Wi-Fi connecter OpenSensor Station features: real-time data requests and browse recently received batch data from it. Also contains objects for database management (DatabaseHelper) and query building (SensorStationSearchQueryBuilder). Extends the Android support compatibility library's FragmentActivity instead of Activity in order to utilize the date-picker Fragment feature.

Author:
Nikos Moumoulidis
